channel.title: One annoying username error
channel.description:
hello everytime i want to go on my server with my username the username changes for e.g
when i logg in with the username "orenge juice" it changes as soon as i log in to sumthing like "ge juice" and some times i cant even get on my server depending what username i choose for e.g i used the name "lol" and i got this error.
[code]30000 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30000 at stream.readString(stream.java:208) at client.run(client.java:16733) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client lol disconnected (***********) Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.NullPointerException at MD5.compute(MD5.java:48) at client.passHash(client.java:14809) at client.savegame(client.java:17069) at client.destruct(client.java:7856) at client.run(client.java:16960) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
Please help much appreciated
Kalvin[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 12:16:55 pm[/size][hr]SO NO ON E NOES HOW TO FIX THIS????????

item.title: One annoying username error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

hello everytime i want to go on my server with my username the username changes for e.g

when i logg in with the username “orenge juice” it changes as soon as i log in to sumthing like “ge juice” and some times i cant even get on my server depending what username i choose for e.g
i used the name “lol” and i got this error.

30000 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30000 at stream.readString(stream.java:208) at client.run(client.java:16733) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client lol disconnected (***********) Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.NullPointerException at MD5.compute(MD5.java:48) at client.passHash(client.java:14809) at client.savegame(client.java:17069) at client.destruct(client.java:7856) at client.run(client.java:16960) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

Please help much appreciated
